title: OnePlus Nord CE receives March 2022 security patches in latest update
content:
OnePlus isn’t the best company around when it comes to quick updates. We’re about halfway through March at this point, and the March 2022 security patch level that Google released on March 7 hasn’t appeared on any OnePlus devices. Thankfully, that looks like it might finally change, starting with the OnePlus Nord CE. OnePlus has
